Module project.wgusoftware2project
Package project.wgusoftware2project.helpers

Class MySqlQuery

java.lang.Object
project.wgusoftware2project.helpers.MySqlQuery
public abstract class MySqlQuery extends Object
Abstract class created to interface (create, read, update, delete) with MySQL database.

  • Method Details

    • populateAppts

      public static void populateAppts() throws SQLException
      This method retrieves all Appointments from the Appointments table in MySQL database. Appointment objects are created from each row in the table and they are added to the Inventory's Appointment ObservableList
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • populateCusts

      public static void populateCusts() throws SQLException
      This method retrieves all Customers from the Customers table in MySQL database. Customer objects are created from each row in the table and they are added to the Inventory's Customer ObservableList
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • populateUsers

      public static void populateUsers() throws SQLException
      This method retrieves all Users from the Users table in MySQL database. User objects are created from each row in the table and they are added to the Inventory's User ObservableList
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • populateContacts

      public static void populateContacts() throws SQLException
      This method retrieves all Contacts from the Contacts table in MySQL database. Contact objects are created from each row in the table and they are added to the Inventory's Contact ObservableList
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • insertAppt

      public static int insertAppt(Appointments addAppt) throws SQLException
      This method accepts an Appointment object as input to be added into the Appointments Table of the MySQL database. Fields are extracted from the Appointment object and used to populate the columns of a row corresponding to the object.
      Parameters:
      addAppt - Appointment object to be added to MySQL database
      Returns:
      rowsAffected Integer of Table row updated
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • insertCust

      public static int insertCust(Customers addCust) throws SQLException
      This method accepts a Customer object as input to be added into the Customer Table of the MySQL database. Fields are extracted from the Customer object and used to populate the columns of a row corresponding to the object.
      Parameters:
      addCust - Customer object to be added to MySQL database
      Returns:
      rowsAffected Integer of Table row updated
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • updateAppt

      public static int updateAppt(Appointments addAppt) throws SQLException
      This method accepts an Appointment object as input for updating a row of the Appointments Table of the MySQL database. The row to update is identified by the WHERE statement referencing the APPOINTMENT_ID. Fields are extracted from the Appointment object and used to update the columns of a row corresponding to the object.
      Parameters:
      addAppt - Appointment object used to update Table row in MySQL database
      Returns:
      rowsAffected Integer of Table row updated
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • updateCustomer

      public static int updateCustomer(Customers addCustomer) throws SQLException
      This method accepts a Customer object as input for updating a row of the Customer Table of the MySQL database. The row to update is identified by the WHERE statement referencing the CUSTOMER_ID. Fields are extracted from the Customer object and used to update the columns of a row corresponding to the object.
      Parameters:
      addCustomer - Appointment object used to update Table row in MySQL database
      Returns:
      rowsAffected Integer of Table row updated
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • deleteAppt

      public static int deleteAppt(int apptId) throws SQLException
      This method accepts an Integer as input for deleting the matching row of the Appointment Table of the MySQL database. The row to delete is identified by the WHERE statement referencing the APPOINTMENT_ID.
      Parameters:
      apptId - Integer ID used to delete matching Table row in MySQL database
      Returns:
      rowsAffected Integer of Table row updated
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • deleteCust

      public static int deleteCust(int custId) throws SQLException
      This method accepts an Integer as input for deleting the matching row of the Customer Table of the MySQL database. The row to delete is identified by the WHERE statement referencing the CUSTOMER_ID.
      Parameters:
      custId - Integer ID used to delete matching Table row in MySQL database
      Returns:
      rowsAffected Integer of Table row updated
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • getCountries

      public static void getCountries() throws SQLException
      This method retrieves all countries from the Country Table of the MySQL database. Each row is used to create a Country object that is stored in the Inventory's Country ObservableList
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • getStates

      public static void getStates() throws SQLException
      This method retrieves all states from the State Table of the MySQL database. Each row is used to create a State object that is stored in the Inventory's State ObservableList
      Throws:
      SQLException
